title: IQR Calculator – Interquartile Range, Q1, Median, Q3 & Outliers

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: IQR = Q3 − Q1 Lower fence = Q1 − 1.5 × IQR Upper fence = Q3 + 1.5 × IQR
